transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Haan, Aditya ji.
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Haan ji, bataiye sir, aapka call aaya tha.
Customer: Aap last week apna koi meeting schedule karne ka baat tha, fir main us din baat nahi kar paya, fir ek baar wapas phone kiya tab aap busy the, fir aapka phone aaya Monday to main out of station tha isliye main bola aaj phone kar leta hu.
Executive: Okay. To sir, abhi bataiye kya subscription ke liye kuch aapne discuss karna tha kya?
Customer: Nahi, aap kaun bol rahe hain, kya naam hai aapka?
Executive: Ji, Nidhi bol rahi hu IndiaMART se. Maheshwari Industries mein Aditya ji se baat ho rahi hai na?
Customer: Mera to subscription already aap dekh rahe hain na, Nidhi ji.
Executive: Haan ji, haan ji.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Okay. Aap hi ne bola tha na wo catalog kya update karna hai to wo ek meeting karni hai one week wala ho gaya hai na kya?
Executive: Accha sir, wo feedback meeting tha actually aapka. Abhi aapne newly onboard kara tha na us cheez ke regarding.
Customer: Haan, to aapne bola tha kya keyword wagarah bhi add karna hai product mein kya kya karna hai.
Executive: Ji haan, aapka catalog pura bolte hain na jaise jis product mein aap deal bhi kar rahe ho.
Customer: Haan, haan.
Executive: Hello. Kis type ke isme add, hello.
Customer: Haan, boliye.
Executive: To wo sare aap naam to jante hain to wo sare naam aapke catalog mein add karna hai jisse ki buyers ko aapki profile visible ho sake.
Customer: Haan, aapne mere ko whatsapp kiya tha ki ye sare naam aapke product keywords mein add karenge ye sab.
Executive: Haan ji. To sir, abhi
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Abhi isme main aapko, hello, haan ji.
Customer: Haan, boliye na.
Executive: Main aapko 4:00 baje tak video meeting ka link share kar do, hum us time pe connect kar sakte hain tab aap free ho jaoge?
Customer: Ya to kal morning kar lijiye madam better rahega.
Executive: Kal morning. Okay, theek hai. Sir aapne aapke paas mein
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Mera number aapke paas available nahi tha kya?
Customer: Hai, hai. Uspe bhi phone kiya tha reply nahi hua.
Executive: Okay, actually main washroom mein thi is wajah se main dhyan nahi de payi.
Customer: Koi problem nahi hai, koi problem nahi hai.
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: Haan, haan. To main ya to kal subah 11:00 baje ke aas paas aapko uspe text kar deta hu whatsapp pe.
Executive: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Haan ji, to main kal morning mein 11:00 baje ki aapki meeting schedule kar do, suitable rahega aapko?
Customer: Kal haan 11:30 kar lijiye, main aaram se 11:30 mein factory pe rahunga, office mein rahunga.
Executive: Okay, sure sir. And abhi na aapne jaise customer care pe call ki thi to aapka na ek hamare paas concern open ho gaya tha.
Customer: Accha, accha, accha. Ji, to main usko sure sir, main isko close kar de rahi hu. Baki kal morning mein 11:30 baje ka meeting hum log rakhte hain. Bilkul se baat karenge.
Customer: Theek hai, secondly mere ko ek cheez bataiye na, hello. Aapke Guwahati mein jo IndiaMART ke office hai.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Yahan ka koi area manager ya senior jo bhi aadmi hai uska koi contact number mil sakta hai?
Executive: Sir, actually aapka jo case hai na wo IndiaMART ke headquarter mein hai. Noida sector 135.
Customer: Accha.
Executive: Ji. To aapko jo account manager hai na, mera mera nahi wo to dekhiye wo to mera account manage aap kar hi rahe hain.
Executive: Ji haan.
Customer: Mera dusra concern tha yahan ke jo do sales ke bande jo mere ko mere se mile the jinhone mera final kiya tha.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Ji, unke ethics ko leke mere ko complaint file karna hai.
Executive: Okay, aap hame bata dijiye sir, hamare side se ho jayega.
Customer: Nahi, mere ko usko pakadna bhi padega aaj us aadmi ki wajah se meri meri integrity pe meri company pe question uth gaya hai.
Executive: Okay, sir kya ho gaya? Kyunki aapka jo sales ka aadmi tha.
Executive: Ji. To jab hum package final kiye the to pehle humne bola tha ki six months ka lenge to us pe agree ho gaye the. Fir wo bole ki wo payment jo hai wo one time mein aap kar nahi sakte aur hamare bank se every month auto debit hone ka system nahi tha.
Executive: Okay. To fir humne yearly mein jab wo karte karte ek mahina nikla jab tak hum yearly mein convert hue to thoda price increase ho gaya tha.
Executive: Okay. To wo banda mere office bhi aayega mere boss ke samne bhi baat hui usne bola ki nahi sir ₹2000 main aapko cash wapas return kar dunga aapka subscription mein kam ho jayega.
Executive: Okay, aapko unka naam yaad hai sir?
Customer: Haan, naam hai na Dimbeshwar Saikia naam hai uska.
Executive: Okay, theek hai.
Customer: Maine wo kar liya hai ab kya hua wo 15 din se mera phone nahi utha raha hai koi call back nahi kar raha hai ek Partho Pratim bol ke uske sath mein koi manager tha wo bhi aaya tha. Wo banda bhi phone nahi utha raha hai aur ab mere office mein ye ho gaya ki bhaiya ₹2000 mere samne bol ke gaya tha to tumko to deke tum kha gaya kya.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: So I am not able to get in contact with anyone in the Guwahati office aap mere ko kisi ka bhi number de sakte hain to unka location leke ja ke usko pakad ke launga mere office mein. This is absolutely ridiculous aap ek chhote se amount ke liye itna bada bakheda kar ke rakh diya inhone.
Executive: Nahi, sir ek minute call pe rukiye aap bas main ek baar na naam confirm kar li aap mujhe unka naam bata dijiye.
Customer: Haan ji kya?
Executive: Naam bata dijiye.
Customer: Dimbeshwar Saikia.
Executive: Ek second rukiye sir main karti hu video.
Customer: Ab wo hai ki nahi hai mere ko pata nahi hai.
Executive: Okay, ji haan ye aapke sales representative hain.
Customer: Ye hai inke sath ek aur hoga naam Partho Pratim bol ke jo uske upar hai. Area manager.
Executive: Partho Pratim.
Customer: Hai na Partho Pratim? Haan ji, haan ji. Ji, wo bhi sath mein aaye the.
Customer: Aur un un unse bhi baat hua tha subscription ke bola wo Dimbeshwar aap se baat kiya hi hai to wo jo bhi hum logo ko milta hai commission ya jo bhi hum ₹2000 aapko cash mein return karenge hum online mein return nahi kar sakte. Mane online jo aapka payment hai hum usme kam nahi kar sakte.
Customer: To maine ye pitch apne office mein kar diya tha and they all agreed ki theek hai koi baat nahi hai.
Executive: Theek hai, main ek baar na inki details check karti hu then main ek baar agar hamare paas koi detail hoti hai to main unki details aapko initiate karti hu.
Customer: Nahi, inki details to mere paas hai hi contact number to hai but they are not responding. Mera bolne ka matlab hai agar aapke Guwahati office ka koi address agar mere ko de sakte hain ya yahan ka koi area manager to hoga inse upar to hoga jo area manager hai.
Executive: Ji. Sir, unka koi contact number de sakte hain to main contact karta hu unko ki bhaiya unko mere office mein bhejo aur unko mere office mein bolne bolo ki nahi humne paise nahi diya hai mujhe paise nahi chahiye ab I don't care ₹2000 is not a big deal for me. But it should not raise a question on me, right?
Executive: Yes, sir.
Customer: That is the thing. Bhai tumko nahi dena hai to mat do mere ko paise nahi chahiye lekin aake mere office mein cheez ko to clear karoge mere boss ke samne ki haan sir humne paise nahi diye inko. Hum nahi de payenge ya jo bhi hai hum chhod diye IndiaMART ya jo bhi hum kiye. Whatever the reason.
Executive: Ji. Ji. Haan, at least main itne se amount ke liye main answerable hona mere ko accha nahi laga na.
Executive: Ji bilkul sir, main agar aapka problem hai yaar theek hai you are a salaried person you cannot afford aapne bol diya kaam lene ke liye ab aap nahi de pa rahe ho to clear bol do sir main nahi de pa raha hu baat khatam ho gaya yaar main close karunga chapter ko. Why is it just pending na?
Executive: Okay, sure sir, aap mujhe thoda sa time dijiye.
Customer: Maine isliye bola aap inka mere ko koi official abhi complaint nahi karna hai.
Executive: Ji. Wo agar mere ko zarurat pada to main baad mein proper ek mail ke through kar dunga but mere ko koi inka area manager ya koi bhi aur bande ka number mil jaye jo inse contact kara sake to main ja ke kam se kam matter close karu na apna isliye to bol raha tha aapko.
Executive: Okay, sure sir, main is issue ke andar like I'll look into this, theek hai main aapko inform karti hu agar mere paas koi information milti hai.
Customer: Contact number, dekhiye area manager ya Guwahati ka jo bhi head hai unka sales head wagarah ka to number aap logo ko mil hi jayega system mein. To koi milta hai to ek baar mere ko just number to share kariyega na main ja ke baat karta hu na unko.
Executive: Okay, sure sir and abhi jo aapne secondly mera jo meeting hai wo aap 11:30 ke liye schedule kar lijiye kal ka.
Executive: Ji, theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai, baki main aapko customer care mein aap wo usko main mail mein dekh raha hu ticket raise jo hai wo cancel karwa dijiye wo to aap se contact karne ke liye maine kiya tha.
Executive: Okay, okay. Actually kabhi bhi aapko kuch bhi zarurat ho to aap mere whatsapp pe agar message bhi kar doge to main us pe reply kar dungi actually main us time pe washroom mein thi is wajah se aapko revert nahi kar payi.
Customer: Theek hai, theek hai, theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai, baki main ye concern aapka close karti hu. Thank you.
Customer: Okay and if you get any contact number Guwahati ka koi sales ka to mere ko dijiyega na please area manager.
Executive: Bilkul, bilkul, bilkul sir, I'll look into this. Okay sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants contact of area manager in Guwahati.

- Complaint against sales team ethics.

- Sales person promised cash return of ₹2000.

- Sales person is not answering calls.



Resolution:

- Executive assured to look into the matter.

- Meeting scheduled for the next day at 11:30 AM.

- Agreed to cancel the ticket raised in customer care.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will inform if any information is found.



Alert (If Any):

complaint

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- area manager, complaint, sales team, refund, meeting, subscription
